alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued May 24 at 7:16AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Warning is in effect through tonight... * SURF...Surfs of 15 to 17 feet will impact southerly shores through tonight. * TIMING...through tonight. * IMPACTS...Deadly rip currents, high surfs, and coastal erosion and possible inundation. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 708 TAEAO ASO LUA ME 24 2022 ...Ua iai nei le Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...O galu maualuluga e 15 i le 17 futu o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute o le atunu`u e oo atu i le po nanei. * TAIMI...e oo atu i le po nanei. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E matua malosi le aave o le sami, e matua maualuluga galu, ma e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O lapataiga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gatafale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Faiva po o le ona o le siisii o tulaga o sami ma galu, e le tatau i le au fai mamalu lautele ona fagogota pe maimoa i galu. O i latou i le matafaga, e mafai ona maua faafuaseia e galu.
info.instruction: A high surf warning indicates dangerous large breaking waves will pound the shoreline in the warning area, producing deadly rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
